${ModID}:AlchemistryImprov.NAME: Alchemistry Improv
${ModID}:AlchemistryImprov.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a Potion Slot for this turn. NL Obtain an ${ModID}:Acid_Bomb. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Anarchy.NAME: Anarchy
${ModID}:Anarchy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Potion Slot{!M!|>1=s} for the rest of combat. NL Fill all your empty Potion Slots with ${ModID}:Grenades.

${ModID}:BombLauncher.NAME: Bomb Launcher
${ModID}:BombLauncher.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next {!M!|1=potion|@=!M! potions} you use this turn {!M!|1=is|@=are} used twice.

${ModID}:BottleWill.NAME: Bottle Will
${ModID}:BottleWill.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Obtain a potion that gains X{!Upgrades!|>0=+1} [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Chemistry.NAME: Chemistry
${ModID}:Chemistry.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you use a potion, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Distill.NAME: Distill
${ModID}:Distill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL {@@}Exhaust a card of cost X{!Upgrades!|<1=-1} or less and obtain a potion with its effects. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ExtraCompartment.NAME: Extra Compartment
${ModID}:ExtraCompartment.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Potion Slot for this turn. NL Obtain a ${ModID}:Grenade. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:Forge.NAME: Forge
${ModID}:Forge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Obtain a *Blessing *Of *The *Forge. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TheBigOne.NAME: The Big One
${ModID}:TheBigOne.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Obtain a ${ModID}:Mini-Nuke. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Unburdened.NAME: Unburdened
${ModID}:Unburdened.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each empty Potion Slot you have.
